replies.body:
Actually the PGM code was leaked and retrrived by a hacker. 
They also gave everyone admin permissions on the website https://twitter.com/Aefonix/status/472894363115483136/photo/1
 
 
So yeah, OCN went down to prevent any damage.
replies.body_tagged:

replies.body: I am scared.
replies.body_tagged: I am scared.

replies.body:
So this explains the first time the site went down. I thought he was referring to the 5-day shutdown for maintenance and database relocation/reconfiguration. Thanks for clearing that up. 

@Everyone else: No, this "threat" isn't real, but it wouldn't hurt to change your password every once in a while anyway.
